p: The present study aimed to provide information on the occurrence and diversity of HEV in the Italian population through molecular analysis of urban sewage samples collected at WTPs. A number of studies have investigated HEV in urban sewages in nonendemic countries [ 19, 23, 26, 28, 55, 56, 57, 58, 59, 60, 61, 62, 63, 64]. However, most of these studies are limited in time and conducted on a small number of samples. The present study, instead, describes a large-scale investigation, with a significant number of samples, a nationwide geographic coverage, and a nine-year observation period.
